meanings.definition: A man who manages household duties and childcare while his spouse works outside the home.
meanings.sent1: The househusbands in our neighborhood are skilled at taking care of the children and keeping the house tidy.
meanings.sent2: Many househusbands enjoy spending time with their kids and ensuring the home runs smoothly.
meanings.sent3: The househusbands organized a fun playdate for the children, showing off their multitasking abilities.
meanings.sent4: Being a househusband is like being the captain of a ship, steering the family through daily tasks.
meanings.sent5: The image of househusbands juggling chores and childcare is a testament to their dedication.
